summary: This is a US Attorney's Office email requesting prisoner production for Jeffrey Epstein's court appearance on July 18, 2019, before Judge Berman in the Southern District of New York. The document shows logistical arrangements for Epstein's detention hearing in case 19 Cr. 490 (RMB).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The prisoner being produced for court for a detention hearing in case 19 Cr. 490 (RMB).

persons.name: Berman
persons.context: The judge presiding over the court proceeding in room 17B.

connections.description: Epstein is the defendant appearing before Judge Berman for a detention hearing.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Detention Hearing
events.description: Court production request for Jeffrey Epstein's detention hearing before Judge Berman in the Southern District of New York.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for a detention hearing on July 18, 2019, in case 19 Cr. 490 (RMB).
The hearing was to take place before Judge Berman in room 17B at the Southern District of New York courthouse.
The document is a prisoner production request from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
Epstein's prisoner number was 76318-054 at the time of this request.
